title: My storage is full because my "photo and videos" storage take 35GB but i only have few pictures
content: My storage is full. When i check the storage, my "photo and videos" take space around 35GB. It take more than half of my storage (64GB). But when i want to delete pictures and videos, there is only few pictures and videos show up. Why this is happen to my phone? Is it because the picture/videos is hidden or my phone has serious problem?
